1.title: Where do you shrink?!

11.content:
Will is desperate to get a few more minutes
of sleep. He is not a morning person.

His mother has already shouted for him to
come to breakfast. He turns over and ignores
the summons.

His father knocks on his door. "Time to rise
and shine, Will."

Will ignores the knock and buries his face in his pillow.

His kid brother, Jack, runs into the room.
Jack is only seven.

"Time to get up, Will!" Jack shouts.

Without opening your eyes, you warn Jack to
get out. Your brother races from the room.

It's no good. You can't get back to sleep.
You get out of bed, stretch and walk toward
your open window.

You look out and breathe deep to get some
fresh air. At that same moment, the city
council-sanctioned spraying for insects is
taking place. A big tanker is going down the
street spraying a white mist toward all the
houses.

You take a deep breath of the mist. You choke
and cough and slam the window closed.

Your mother shouts for you again. Her voice
echoes in your head as the room begins to
spin. Will, dizzy and sick at his stomach,
lurches toward his bathroom.

He doesn't get far before he collapses. Only
a few moments pass, and a groggy, queasy Will
begins to awaken again.

His head hurts and he rubs his eyes in
disbelief. Everything has grown to enormous
size! What has happened? He gets to his feet
and realizes that he has shrunk. He wonders
how small he has become.

She drops you back into the glass beaker and turns off the stove. As she is putting the dirty dishes into the dishwasher your 7 year old brother Jack makes his way down the stairs from his bedroom and comes into the kitchen. As your mom kisses his forehead good morning, he notices the beaker with you inside of it sitting on the counter.

Immediately he has his hands on the glass beaker and is lifting it up to his face to get a better look at it. "Mom, what happened? How did Will shrink?" As you are struggling to keep from being knocked all over the beaker as your little brother is holding it, you hear your mom say to him "Well, Jack, we aren't really sure what happened to him. But we can't take care of him like this, and we need some extra money. So since he is so small, we are going to see if Austin wants to buy him from us." She is very afraid that Jack wwill be upset because he's not going to be able to keep you himself.

"You mean he's not going to be living here with us anymore?" he asked. "No, honey, I'm afraid he's not" she replied. "Well, what is going to happen to his room, and his TV, and Playstation 2? Can I have them now?" he asked somewhat excitedly.

With a great deal of relief your mom smiles and says "Well, sure. You can have his room and everything in it."

"YES!!!" Jack screamed out and pretty much drops the beaker on the counter. Both you and your mom are pretty surprised it didn't break. He runs out of the kitchen and up the stairs to check out his new room.

Right about then your dad walks in the room as he is about to leave for work. He sees the glass beaker with you inside it, and gets a very puzzled look on his face.

Your dad carefully lifts you up and brings you by your mother. He moves away so that Jack doesn't see that you were there, so they can speak privately. Jack was pretty busy anyway, playing around with all of your stuff, now his.

"Honey, what is this!! Why did you shrink Will!!" your dad says confused.

Finally, someone with some sense. Your dad would help you out of this mess. He wouldn't let you get sold away or killed by your terrifying mother. You waved and clapped for your father, a bit happy that things would finally get back to normal.

"Well, it's like what we talked about. Funds have been tough so we decided to take action and shrink Will." She said confidently, unsure what the matter was. You smiled happy too. She needed to get a grip or something. Then your father said something that made your heart sink.

"Yeah, but. . you shrank him without me being there too!! You promised we could watch him shrink together!!"

No!!

Not so carefully, your father places you on a nearby dresser. You shake and quake, rattled in your little cage.

"I'm sorry dear!! I should have gotten you when he started shrinking!"

Your mother winks at your dad and bends down to 'get something' revealing her luscious cleavage.

"Is there anyway. . . you could possibly forgive me!!"

Your father can't take much more of that. He grabs your mother and begins to viciously make out with her as each of them rubs each other wildly. You were front and center for this 'show' and in actuality wished you could be somewhere else right now. They were so loud and. . noisy.

"Mom, Dad!!" Jack yelled.

Saved by the brother!!

Your parents stopped macking each other and recomposed themselves. Your dad was the first to speak up.

"I guess we probably shouldn't be doing it. . in front of . . .him." He said pointing at your little holding cell. Your mother put her fingers to his lips and gave him a little kiss.

"I don't mind if a bug watches. . ."

Your father and mother giggle seductively as you hear Jack complaining and moaning in the background.

"We better take care of him. What are you going to do with him, now!! I thought you were going to eat him after you shrank him."

"I was planning too, but I thought maybe I could sell him to Austin instead."

Your father made a hushed expression.

"Come on. . we are already saving so much money by getting rid of Will!! Austin is just a boy, at most he will give you only a few dollars. We might as well. . . enjoy him ourselves. Besides, I already missed out on him shrinking. I don't want to miss you being a bad girl to him, too!!"

You didn't like the sound of that.

Your mother was again, flushed and excited by the idea.

"Well. . . I guess if you put it that way. . I'll think of something else then."

Your father finally left the room and went into your former one to see what Jack was complaining about. Meanwhile, your mother picked up the beaker you were in and looked you over.

"I guess your not getting out of the fire so easy, now, are you, Will?!?" your mother said with a mischievous smile.

Your mother walks to her bedroom, still carrying the beaker with you in it. You look up at her smiling face, scared to think about what she could do to you. As her bare feet walked, you had time to think about your situation. Your mother had been kind to you, and always stood up for you. She had helped you on homework and even helped you when a bully had stolen your bike. She protected you and was always there for you.

This wasn’t the woman you knew though.

This woman was no longer your mother, and she didn’t consider you her son anymore. You were a bug, one that she wanted to have fun with until she decided to exterminate you. She set the beaker down on the table and sat down on her bed

“Let’s get comfortable, shall we?” You watched as she removed some of her clothes and dropped them to the ground. She was quickly left in her bra and panties, giving a nice smile. Ideas started to run in her head. You simply fell to your knees, she made it clear that she owned you now. “What shall I do now, hm? What do you think?” Your mother asked. You looked at her up and down. She had a beautiful body, but you didn’t know how to answer her question. As you were thinking, your father returned.

“Austin took Jack to his place to babysit so we’re now alone.” He said and kissed your mother. “Have you thought about what to do with him?” Your mother looked at you, suddenly smiling.

“Actually, I think I know what to do with him.” She said. Your father waited for her answer.

11112111222.content:
Your dad says to your mom "Honey, I would've thought you'd have him cooking by now."

"Well, I had an idea. Since we really need to cut some costs, I thought maybe we could see if Austin would do some babysitting for Jack, and maybe cut the lawn for us for a while if we let him keep Will. I think we could get a couple of years of babysitting out of him for it."

"Great idea" your dad says. "Give me a call at the office and let me know how it goes" he says as the front doorbell rings. He opens the door to two boys, one 8 years old, and one 11. "Hello, Mr. Dawson" the older boy says as they both kick off their shoes. "I hope you don't mind I had to bring Logan with me this morning. Mom said she'd be back after lunch."

"Oh, that's fine, Austin" your dad answers. "Jack loves playing with Logan anyways. You need to head into the kitchen. My wife has something she'd like to talk to you about." And your dad heads outside and closes the door behind him.

Since Austin and Logan are much younger than you, you really don't know them very well. They are both pretty well behaved kids who are shy, and both have looked up to you somewhat and have always been a little intimidated by you. You can easily tell they are brothers, both having blond hair with bangs that hang down just above their eyes, and both being very slim. They even tend to dress alike most of the time, today being no exception. They are both wearing blue Nike shirts, red shorts, and white tube socks scrunched down around their ankles. Logan hangs out with Jack quite a bit, and sometimes you have tended to be a little annoyed by them when they have gotten on your nerves and you told them to get lost. You've never really talked to Austin much.

"Hello, Austin. Hi Logan." your mom says as they walk into the kitchen. But both boys don't really seem to hear her as they notice you inside the beaker on the counter. Jack comes running down the stairs into the kitchen and yells "Logan, you gotta come upstairs with me and see all my new stuff."

Logan seems a little reluctant to leave as he is staring at you, a tiny person in a glass beaker, but your mom says "Yeah, Logan, why don't you go with Jack for a few minutes. I need to talk to Austin about something. Oh, and Jack, would you see if you can find that old hamster cage Will has in his closet and bring it down here?"

Jack nearly pulls Logan's arm out of his socket as he drags him up the stairs. Your mom picks up the beaker and says "Let's sit down at the table, Austin."

They both sit down and your mom puts the beaker right in front of Austin. "As you can obviously see something has happened to Will. Something has shrunken him, and there is no way to get him big again. As you know he was the one around here who would babysit Jack and do all of the yardwork, and now he can't do either one of those things anymore. Well, I was wondering if you would be willing to babysit Jack for us when we need it, and keep the lawn mowed for a while if we let you keep Will?"

Austin is both stunned, and very excited at what has just been offered him. "You mean, you want me to take Will home with me and keep him?" he asks. "Well, yes" your mom replies. "It might be nice if you would bring him over sometimes when you babysit so Jack could play with him a little bit, too."

"Mrs. Dawson, Jack can play with him anytime. In fact, he can take care of him next month when we go to Florida for a week. And I'll babysit and mow all you want for the rest of my life." They both laugh at Austin's excitement.

Jack and Logan come running down the stairs. Jack is carrying two or three of his new Playstation 2 games, and Logan is carrying the hamster cage. "Oh, good" your mom says. "And we'll even throw in this cage to keep him in. You kids can go ahead and put him in there."

Your mom picks up the beaker and pours you out onto the kitchen table in front of Austin. Logan sets the cage down on the table right next to you, and before you can even begin to move you are surrounded by Austin's hand. You start to struggle to get away, but he gently restrains you and lifts you up in front of his gigantic face. Logan is also trying to move in close to get a closer look at you. Austin's huge blue eyes are gleaming with delight as he realizes what an incredibly cool new pet he has. Logan is begging to hold you, and finally Austin says he can. He tells Logan to be very careful with you as he puts you on Logan's open palm. Logan's soft, moist fingers close around you and you can see the same delight in his gigantic blue eyes.

After a few moments Austin opens the top of the cage and tells Logan to put you inside. He lowers you into the cage, which is made of plastic with metal bars. It is designed to add on tubes for the hamsters to run around in, and there is a hole where the tubes can be added which is closed up with a round plastic plug which is just slid into the hole. Obviously a hamster wouldn't be smart enough to realize he could shove that plastic plug out of the hole and get away, but you are. You are hoping against hope they will forget about it so you can make your escape later.

2 Months.
2 Months had passed since that day....well at least you think it had been that long. Sitting in a cage all day with nothing to do made it hard to keep track of anything nowadays.
Your mistress had brought you to her personal closet after your decision, showing you she had already prepared a big hamster cage. And you've been here since, at first trying to think of ways to escape, but slowly you gave that up.
Your mistress hadn't been as bad as you thought. Most she requested when she wasn't in a pissy mood were small massages, on her feet or back or any other place.
You had semi expected to be of use in....other, more private ways. But amazingly she had left off on that. Part of you was relieved and another part was....dissapointef.
Of course....when she wasn't in a good mood then that's when you worried. That is when she started to torture you.
One morning for instance, she stormed in, having had an arguement with her husband. You didn't even get a chance to speak before she had opened up your cage and grabbed you, chucking you into a large pile of clothes, thankfully breaking your fall with minimal injury.....until she brought her foot down on you, making you scream in fear. You couldn't hear much except for angry yelling, and something about your father...excuse me, your mistress's mate.
She moved her foot eventually, but the anger didn't stop. She had picked you up between her toes and dropped you onto the floor, where she got on her knees above you. All you could do was stare up fearfully at your pissed off mistress as she just glared, her two ivory colored legs on either side of you, like Jean covered towers. And because of that potion, your mama won't ever return to her normal size again as well. You'll be forever a bug and she'll be forever a whale." Will's Mom gave a sigh. "Thanks for trying."

You hear them talking and then at lunch you hear them go to the schools pool, in which they strip to their underwear for!
1221.title: Hide in his own shoe

1222.content:
Will slides off the side of his shoe, falls
to the tile floor. The impact is jarring. He
hides against the wall provided by the side
of his shoe.
As he watches, three of his teammates enter
the room. Their names are Brent, Matt and
Donnie. They are each more than 400 feet
tall!
Donnie sits on a bench and begins to peel off
clothing. Brent and Matt are still
rough-housing, trading mock blows with each
other.
Will decides he should attempt to contact
them. He is almost ready to dash into the
open when he hears something. To his disgust,
a huge cockroach, twice his size, scurries
past him and into the open.
"Look at that!" Matt shouts.
"What is it?" Brett replies.
"A freaking cockroach!" Matt answers. Will
watches as Matt raised one sneaker high above
the roach. The bug, sensing the shadow,
starts to flee. In that same instant, Matt's
enormous shoe crashes down on top of the bug.
Will is sickened when Matt raises his shoe.
Splattered beneath the sole of the shoe are a
gooey mass of cockroach guts.
Donnie has finished undressing. "Come on,"
the giant boy tells his friends. "Let's hit
the showers."
Soon, Matt and Brett follow Donnie into the
showers. Will, left alone, creeps from the
shelter of his shoe and approaches the
discarded clothing of the other giants. Up
close, he inspects the flattened cockroach on
the bottom of Matt's sneaker. The bug's
exoskeleton is mixed in with mushy innards.
Will feels sick. He begins to run in a blind
panic. He has got to get out of the locker
room. He has got to find help.
He hasn't gotten far when he hears the
thunderous steps of more of his teammates. He
looks around for shelter. He sees a tent-like
wrapper that had held a package of crackers.
He scrambles toward this meager shelter.
As he does, one of the giants, a boy named
Carl, sees the fleeting movement. "What was
that?" Carl wonders. Then, he remembers all
the cockroaches he has seen in the locker
room. "Damn bugs!" Carl mutters, and prepares
to step on the discarded wrapper.
1222.title: Locker Room Bug Stomp

choices: Will begs his friends for help
His friends toy more with Will
12221.content:
Will managed to dash from beneath the edge of the
wrapper just as Carl's huge shoe came down. The
hurricane blast of air blew him across the floor.
Unfortunately, his actions had attracted the
colossal giant's attention.

Carl leaned forward and lowered an enormous hand.
He managed to grasp you between two huge
fingertips. He lifted teeny Will, despite Will's
struggles, far into the air until the tiny teen
was dangling in front of his face.

Even the release of air as Carl exhaled felt like
a gust of wind in a storm. "Shit! Wait until the
guys see you!" Carl said.

«««««««

A short while later...

Will felt a sickly feeling forming in his stomach
as he looked up, and saw that his view was blocked
off by enormous guys, their huge bodies and
heads.
He recognized them. In addition to Carl, his other
teammates, Brent, Matt and Donnie, were staring
down at him.

A huge hand hovered behind him, wielding a straw
the size of a flagpole and nudging the hollow
plastic tube into his shoulder.

Huge faces, stretched with hideous grins and
gaping eyes staring down at him, shifted and
laughed.

"He's moving!" Donnie said.

"He's really alive!" Brent remarked. "And so tiny!
Well, make him do something."

With that, the large straw hovered above him. The
giant Carl blew through the other end, and the
compressed air blew into his body. The gathered
giants laughed as Will tried to move away from the
force of the wind from the giant's breath through
the straw.

"Here, let me try, Carl," a giant said.

Suddenly, the straw changed hands. The next blast
of breath came from Matt and nearly knocked Will
off his feet. The giant laughed, then sent another
hurricane of air through the straw. Will stumbled,
and then was sent sprawling across the tabletop
from the force of the air through the straw.

"Careful," Carl said. His huge hand prevented Will
from being blown off the tabletop. "Let's keep him
around for awhile."
12221.title: Caught!

choices: Friends climb up to join Will
Will climbs down to join his friends
122211.content:
"Guys, please, you gotta help me!" Will shouts. He stares up at his colossal friends.

Carl, Matt, Brent and Donnie stared down at their unfortunate teammate.

"Dudes, what happened to him?" Donnie wonders.

"Maybe he stayed in the shower too long," smartass Brent said with a smirk as he looked down at Will. The two boys had harbored a simmering rivalry for years.

Will could not believe they were not acting to help him.

"Hey! What's that?" Carl asks in an excited voice.

The boys rush over to a corner where they find a strange, pulsating purple blob.

From the mountainous tabletop, Will can see the strange blob. The same substance that caused him to shrink!

"No! Stay away from it! Guys! Don't!" Will attempts to shout a warning.

But, like boys are prone to do, Brett reaches out a finger to poke at it.

"Gross, dudes!" Brent exclaims.

The other guys start poking at the weird blob.

Atop the table, Will notices before they do that they are, just as happened to him, starting to shrink.

Will watches their enormous clothes fall to the floor. A moment later he sees his four friends, now tiny and naked, crawl out of the heaps of enormous clothing.
122211.title: The Purple People Shrinker Returns

122212.content:
"Keep him around for awhile?" Will repeated, fearfully. He couldn't believe that his teammates were doing this. He'd harbored a rivalry with Brent for years, but Matt and Carl weren't disliked at all. How could they be doing this to him!?

Will, who lay on his stomach, pulled himself up to his feet. His friends looked like titans around him, each more than 400 feet tall.

"Hey," remarked Brent, suddenly. "What else do you think we can do with him?"

Will screamed out in frustration and fear and began to run. He was quickly blocked by Carl's hand, which he ran into full-force and bounced off of. Like a fleshy fence, he realized that Carl's hand was inescapable.

He had to get out of here, he decided. Before they did anything else.

Will turned around, trembling, trying to size up his options. His friends were doing something, Will realized. Probably preparing to do something to him.

Carl was blocking his route.

Matt was digging through his backpack.

Brent was taking off his shoes.

12222.content:
Carl, who is heading to the showers, raises his bare foot over the little wrapper, and his shrunken friend. You try to make a break for it, abandoning the wrapper as a shadow is cast over you. You look back just in time to see his heel flatten the wrapper, only to have his foot press you to the ground a split-second later.
         You squirm under the ball of Carl's large foot - size 13 - as the pressure continues to increase.
12222.title: Carl.

122221.content:
Just when you think you are about to meet your end under the sweaty bare foot of your friend, Carl, the pressure lets up, and his foot lifts. You stick to his sole momentarily, then fall back to the floor. He laughs and places his feet on either side of you, looking down.
         "Hello, Will, we were looking for you!"
         We?
         You suddenly look up, and gasp, the rest of the team is beside Carl, laughing down at you, in their jerseys and socks, or towels and bare feet.
         "Guess what," Carl began, laughing down again....
122221.title: Meet the team.

choices: He puts you back at his feet.
1222211.content:
"You are the new team SLAVE, congratulations man!" Carl laughs and pushes you over with his foot. You fall on your back, a huge wet spot on your chest from where Carl's sweaty toes hit you. The crowd starts laughing down at you.
         "This will be great," Carl continues, but then frowns, "as long as you cooperate little man...."
         You look up at his serious face, incredulous. "Cooperate? COOPERATE?! I won't help you guys, return me to -" You say, taking a defiant step forward, who takes a huge step ON you.
         You cry out, trapped under Carl's foot. "Better lick if you want to live, Slave..."
         You stick your tongue out, battered and beaten, licking Carl's sweaty sole. He laughs, but everything is hushed as you hear the coach call out - "What is going on here, boys?"
         Carl lifts his foot off you, suprised, and the coach sees you down by his own bare feet. "Will?" He says picking you up...
1222211.title: Saved by the coach.

choices: He takes you to his office.
He drops you before the team and leaves.
12222111.content:
"Coach, thank God, you gotta help me!" You cry out, your little body trapped in his warm, massive hand.
         To your suprise, he completely ignores you. "Is this our new one Carl?" The coach asks, nearly talking over you.
         Carl nods. "Yes, coach, he just licked my foot right now. I think he'll make a fine slave for the team."
         "He better..." The coaches eyes suddenly squinted down at you - the man who worked hard to train you, helped you through bad times, experienced your triumphs and defeats - was now sizing you up for a life of slavery under his foot. "I remember the last one... He displeased me."
         Carl nodded again. "You showed him though, coach. That three months between your toes made him think twice about disobeying him."
         This time it was the coach's turn to nod, and crack a smile, as if remember the little soccer player squirming and pleading for mercy between his toes. "I'm sure it won't come down to that," he said, lowering you towards his bare feet, "Will is a good kid."
         By this time, the rest of the team that was present came and sat on the benches around you and the coach, about seven in all, including Carl. You knew them all, they were all friends. Were being the key word. Now they were your masters.
         The coach slid his foot next to you, resting it on its side so his sole faced you. "Ok, I'll start the team meeting as soon as foot boy here starts his duties." He looked down at you, "You can start with mine and go around to the rest of the team in a circle. Now get started!"
         Frightened, you moved quickly to your task, and press against the ball of his foot, licking the sole of the now huge coach. He relaxes a little bit and starts the meeting, seeming pleased, as you work your way across his wrinkled arch. You wince as you are forced to swallow gulp after gulp of foot sweat from the coach, all the while he grins down at you with approval. You finally make it to the rough skin of his calloused heel, where you continue to lick, scratching you tongue. As you stumble away from the foot exhausted, you glance around at the other team only thinking about what you will have to go through with their feet.
         You don't get any time to think about that, however, as a shadow is steadily cast over your puny form. You have no time to react as the coach's foot flattens you to the ground under his arch. You can feel the taught muscle on the sole of that foot - powerful and massive - you only feel even more pitiful.
         "You forgot to lick under my toes!" The coach suddenly roared down at you. "What is wrong with you, don't you remember what Carl said about the last kid that did that?" The bottom of his foot showed you just as little mercy, as the angry coach stood up and put his full weight on you. Lifting his foot, and you with it, he peeled you off and shook his head in disgust.
12222111.title: Team meeting.

choices: Carl; you don't want to upset him.
Keith; he is the only one you can trust, you hope.
122221112.content:
You just stand there, surrounded by seven pairs of bare feet of your once team mates, now your teenage masters. Could it be any worse or humiliating?

"I think he'll be a great slave," Carl says to his teammates.

"Yeah, he has good potention," Keith states with a smile as he gives you a quick glance. To think, your best friend Keith, the guy who you could tell everything to and you could always count on for support is now nothing but a giant who could squish you under his foot!

"It's time to get going, guys," Shane, one of the teens, says. "Who gets to take care of him this time?"

"It's Carl or Keith's turn," Brian, another team mate says. "I say Will should pick his master for the rest of the day.

"Oh k, little guy," Carl growls down at you, "pick wisely. You better hope the loser doesn't get you the next day or they might be a little mad. Of course," a wicked grin slides across his face, "that is if you survive for that long."

Who do you pick?
122221112.title: Chosing a Master

1222211122.content:
Your neck is starting to cramp up from having to bend your head back, as you gaze up at the titan size teens, who are leering down at you.

You feel a knot in your stomach. And your mouth is dry from the situation your in. These were once your team-mates. Not all were your friends but you had gotten along with them. Helped win a few games with them. Now that you are tiny suddenly they become threatening giants. You always thought men and team mates should look out for each other. Instead, because of your size disadvantage, they are lording their advantage over you in an unmanly way. Only losers prey on the weaker. Regardless, to survive you have to play their game.

You take the chance and pick Keith. In the past he was always there for you. And you for him. You put your hand on the nail of his big toe. Your surprised how jagged the surface is and how sharp the edge of the nail is.

In a deep voice full of base, Keith tells you to crawl in between his big toe. You just stare up at him. "Do it!" he shouts at you. His voice rocked your very insides. You push yourself between his big toe. The skin is wet with sweat and oil secretions. Keith comments, "Will I would have never known. But you make a nice piece of foot jewlery." He them puts on a sneaker. You are engulfed by darkness.
1222211122.title: TRapped Between My Friend's Toes

12222111222.content:
Your hanging on in the now hot, humid and rank smelling darkness. You think of All the times you fooled around with Keith and the fun you had. Now your hanging on to his foot in the foul darkness of his sneaker. You don't know what hurts more, being pressed up against the side of Keith's toes as he walks or the fact he let you down. And he would without a thought squash you like a bug. Is size all that made up your friendship. Are people so willy-nilly as to go from good to evil in a flash?

You start to laugh in the steamy darkness. Hanging on for dear life and you find yourself thinking in philosophical terms.

You keep sliding down with each massive step that your former friend takes. You have a real urgent fear. Your fear of sliding down and under the front of Keith's foot. You wrap your arms around Keith's big toe. You feel frustrated in having to grab hold and lean up against tightly a sweaty toe. But you figure it beats ending up a small stain beneath the foot of a teen.

Soon your face is covered with hot skin oils. Bits of sock lint is sticking to your face. Several times you had to spit out the gross feeling and tasting particles.

After what seemed like hours, the rocking motion ends. All motion stops for a moment. The foot starts to move again. Light hits your face. The bright light hurts your eyes. You close them until they grow a customed to the light again. You take in deep breaths of fresh air. You try to remove the taste of hot rubber and cotton from your mouth. You joy of liberation is only short lived. You start to wonder what other "pleasures" Keith has in store for you.

When you open your eyes, a shadow descends on you. It is Keith's mammouth hand. Two fingers the width of an adult tree takes hold of you. The front of one finger closes in on your chest. The other on your back. Your lifted up. You never have encountered something as powerful as the fingers that now hold you. You feel so frail and puny held in their grasp. It would only take a slight pressure to send you into eternity. And this powerful being is your or was, your buddy.

You placed down in his hand. The palm is the width of your parents living room. You look up at the Mount Rushmore size face.
12222111222.title: Dank Ride and Liberation

122221112222.content:
Warm air rushes out from the dark oval openings to Keith's nose. The minor wind storm tosses back your hair. "You ok Will?" asks Keith. While the voice was deep and powerful, the tone sounded friendly. You wonder what game has your former friend started. "Really are you ok?" your giant captor asks. "I'm sorry I had to have you ride between my toes. I couldn't think of any better alternative that would satisfied the others. Boy, I'm glad you picked me and not Carl or some of the others. Otherwise, I don't know what would have happened to you." A giant finger comes down from the heavens and lightly touches your back. You pull away from it. "Hey Will its really ok. I'm not going to mess or waste you. If I didn't go along. They would have given you to someone else and I might have been shrunk."

Keith sounds sincere to you. You take the risk and respond. "You really had me worried back there. But what goes on with these guys?"

"I think it was the coach, who found a way to shrink people. At first it sounded fun. Just having some fun, maybe scaring a shrunken teammate. But it became much more than that. And I found myself part of it. I didn't want them to to turn on me and..." Keith doesn't finish his sentence. And his huge face becomes tense.

"How many guys have they done this too?" you ask. "And what happened to them?" Keith shifts his eyes off of you and doesn't answer. His silence is the answer.

Keith looks down at you again and tells you, "Don't worry buddy I'll take care of you."
Before you can reply, he places you on his bed. His sheets and blankets create a landscape of rolling white multi colored hills. Keith changes out of his clothes and puts on a pair of gray baggy sweat-pants. He stretches out next you on his bed. His fleece cladded legs rise up next to you like a gray cliff. He then picks you up and places you down on his lap. The material is soft and warm. Keith next reaches over to a side table. You can't see what he is getting. However, you hear the sound of a drawer opening. He brings down a clenched fist and opens it up before you.

In his hand is another teen. This teen crawls off using his hands. He just drags his legs behind him. It is a strange sight. You step back. "Don't be afraid. He won't hurt you. He really is very child like," Keith tells you.

"Who is he?"

"This is Chris Barnes. A few months back he was Carl's tiny plaything. Somehow during the time Carl had him, he caused Chris's legs to be paralized. And only God knows what other things Carl did to Chris to cause him to have a mental breakdown. When Carl found his toy was damaged he threw him in a trash can at school. I saw him do it. After Carl had left, I fished through the trash and found Chris. I hid him in a pocket. Those trouser cargo-pockets make transporting tiny people easy. Anyways, since then I have taken care of him." Keith placed Chris back in his hand and stroked the top of his head with his index finger. "I will take care of you too Will." Keith taps the top of your head lightly with a finger.

"Thanks Keith. But I want to be returned to normal. And those creeps have to be stopped."

Keith gives out a sigh. Lifting the lip of a front pocket," I'll think about it. But why don't you rest for now."

You look at the entrance of the pocket. It looks more like an opening to a vast dark cave. On hands and knees, you crawl into the dark warm pocket.
122221112222.title: Giant Keith and Some New Insights

"well then" you say "we have to get into his office and get that gun. shrink me back and the others that survived and then destroy the gun". keith agrees with the plan but feels it's too dangerous for you to go into the office alone. he decides to.....

13.content:
Will is spending a Friday night with his best
friend, Keith. The two sixteen-year-old guys
go to the same high school. Keith's parents
are out of town for the weekend.

Your plans are to watch a video, but first
Keith suggests you look around in his
father's laboratory. His father is a research
scientist at the local university.

The lab is full of test tubes, machinery and
other gadgets.

Will absently picks up a glass tube filled
with a blue liquid.

"What's this?" Will asks Keith.

Keith shrugs. He is looking at a keyboard
panel.

You tilt the tube and some of the liquid
splashes onto your hand. You don't think much
of it, and return the tube.

"This is boring," Will tells Keith.

"All right, " Keith agrees.

They leave the lab and return to the den.

"I'm going to grab a soda," Keith announces.
"You want one?"

"Sure."

After Keith leaves the room, your hand begins
to tingle. The sensation spreads and you feel
like you're on fire. Then, with a lurching
motion, the walls and furniture begin to loom
distant.

With a start, Will realizes he is shrinking.
He starts to shout out for his friend, but
the process escalates rapidly.

He soon shrinks much, much more until he is
only....

131212.content:
Will makes a dash that takes him out of the overturned jar, but his path is suddenly blocked by Craig's descending flp-flop-clad foot. Will smacks against the side of the foot and falls on his back. From this position, he stares up at the two giants he had always considered his friends.
"What's the hurry?" Craig asks. The giant youth laughs and turns toward Keith. "I didn't believe you when you called. This is really incredible."
"Well, like we've talked about, he just needed cutting down to size," Keith said, a smirk on his face as he stared down at his four-inch-tall friend.
Will's mind is reeling. "Why are you doing this? I haven't done anything to you!" Will shouts.
"That's exactly what I'd expect you to say," Keith said. "You're always acting like you're better at everything. You treat the rest of us as your inferiors."
"Yeah," Craig chimed in. "It can get boring living in the shadow of the great Will."
"I never meant to make anyone feel that way," Will insisted.
"That doesn't make things right," Keith said. He lifted his foot, casting his own shadow over his frightened friend. "But, maybe if we teach you what it's like..."
"Please," Will pleaded. "You can't leave me like this. You've got to help me."
"We don't got to do anything," Craig said. Suddenly, he reached down and seized Will in a not-so-gentle grip.
"Let's go teach the little pipsqueak a lesson he won't soon forget," Craig suggests.

132112.content:
Will walks out from under the bed, wondering what to do now. He considers leaving the room and looking for someone who can help him, since he's not confident that anybody will return here soon. It might be better to leave and start looking on his own.

But then, all of a sudden, Tammy comes back into the room. She starts looking around as she enters, seemingly searching for something. For the second time, Will freezes up and starts to panic, worried about being spotted, and is too afraid to run back under the bed. Which is unfortunate, as Tammy happens to look down and easily see him standing there.

The giant girl stares down at him for a few moments before yelping and jumping in surprise. The impact when she lands knocks Will onto his behind, and he just sits there as Tammy kneels down and moves her head closer to him.

"Will?" she asks, clearly shocked at seeing him so tiny. "Is that you?" Suddenly, she begins to blush deeply. Her face turns bright red as she says, "And why are you... Naked?"

Will quickly covers his privates, blushing deeply as well. "Um... I... Well... I shrunk, and my clothes didn't shrink with me..."

"Apparently," Tammy says. Her face is turning back to its original color somewhat, and she begins to frown. "Did Keith do this to you? I've told him not to do experiments on other people before."

Will shakes his head. "No, I got some liquid from a test tube on me... And I guess it made me shrink. Keith left before it happened. He didn't do it."

Tammy nods. "Well, I'm glad he didn't do anything this time. But the question is, what do we do now? It's too dangerous for you to stay at that size... But I don't know much about chemistry, so I don't know if there's an antidote around here. And we should also think about getting you some new clothes." She blushes again at the last part.

Will thinks about what to do now. It's good that Tammy is friendly and willing to help him... But what can they do?

133.content:
Will is unsure of what he would do now, as anyone would be. Before Will has the chance to do much, the door to the den opens and a 400+ foot tall Keith enters the room, two colossal cans of soda in hand.
“Will?” Keith looks confused. “Hey, where’d ya go?”
“Here!” Shouts Will.
Astonishingly, because it rarely is the case, Keith’s eyes become set on the pile of clothes on the den floor. Keith’s face of confusion turns sour, as he realizes that his father’s lab experiment had taken its toll on his now little friend. Keith lumbers toward Will’s clothes. He leans in.
“Will, where are you?”
He hears a voice say “here!”
“Where here?” Keith specifies.
“I’m right under your chin,” pipes up Will.
With that, Keith looks down to see his friend shrunk down out of his clothes, standing no more than an inch tall in front of his clothes, which must now be massive to him.
“Oh shit!” exclaims Keith, whose suspicions were confirmed. Will looks up at Keith’s expansive face a few yards (about 2 inches) above his own. “Here, climb on,” says Keith, placing his hand palm-up on the floor. Will tentatively steps his nude body onto his friend’s hand before it shuts around him.
Before he knows it, Will is in Keith’s bedroom, standing atop his desk, a massive pile of his own clothes standing next to him. The two agree to bring in Keith’s dad to ask how to reverse Will’s shrinkage. Wearily, Keith calls in his father, who upon seeing Will, becomes crazed. Will could see his anger capped with concern.
A day later, Will was sitting on his friend’s alarm clock, waiting for him to awaken and bring him for somewhere else. Keith’s dad had said the day prior that there was no way he knew of to reverse any shrinking by the potion. Luckily, Will wasn’t very phased. At an inch tall, no one could expect him to mow the lawn, wash the dishes, etc. Keith’s father was nice enough to not only let Will stay for as long as he wants, but to shrink his clothes, phone, and shoes too.
At breakfast this morning, Will was presented with a plate which could have almost fit two whole telephone poles tip to tip. On it was a few crumbs from the eggs that Keith had made. After scrambling up onto the plate, walking over to it, and eating it, Will realized that the family had understandably given him too small a portion. He was still hungry. Keith’s plate contained more scrambled eggs and he had a glass of orange juice. Keith’s father was eating a pancake and bacon. He was drinking milk. Keith’s older brother was eating a bowl of cereal, and had a cup of coffee with it which could easily be climbed up to jump into the bowl....
Where did Will go?
133.title: One inch tall

choices: Keith notices Will on his eggs
Keith doesn't notice Will in his eggs
1331.content:
Will jumped off his plate and started to head over to Keith's plate. Scrambled eggs sounded delicious to Will and he couldn't stop smiling thinking about eating more! I'm sure Keith wouldn't mind sharing some of his eggs with me. Will thought as he walked across the kitchen table. The wood of the table was smooth allowing for easy travel to Keith's plate. Once Will arrived, he was in awe at the glorious mound of scrambled eggs. It looked like a delicious yellow mountain! Will looked up at Keith who looked to be having an in-depth conversion with is dad and brother. Will waved his arms up at Keith, "Hey buddy! Can I have some of your eggs?", but it was no use. I know they get in some good convos, but didn't realize how focused they all were at it. Will thought. He sighed and decided to just climb onto Keith's plate, scrambled egg mountain was waiting to be climbed!

Will pushed himself up onto Keith's plate, taking a quick breather once he reached the eggs. Being tiny was hard work and took a lot more energy to do pretty much everything he was used to doing. Will sat down with his back laying against the bottom of Keith's eggs. Boy am I glad to have Keith's father make me normal size again. Will thought as he let out a long sigh. Jumping up, Will turned to look at the mountain of scrambled eggs before him. But being small does have his perks! Will thought excitedly. Will's stomach growled as he licked his lips. Will reached out and took a piece of the scrambled eggs. It was light, kinda rubber-ish, but also soft like fluff. Will ate the piece of egg with a smile on his face. He was much hungrier than he thought. Looking at the pile of eggs, Will dubbed Mount Scramble, he started climbing eating pieces along the way.

This is the life! Will thought as he continued climbing. Every know and then the clunk of metal on ceramic could be heard and Will thought he could see Keiths fork every now and then picking up large amounts of the eggs he was climbing. This is what get for not telling Keith I'm here. Will thought worriedly. But Keith wouldn't eat me, would he? The thought fleeted from Wills head by the time Will reached the top. A direct path to the summit of Mount Scramble could be seen behind Will. Trying to keep his balance, Will stood on top of the summit of scrambled eggs with his hands on hips admiring the view from his friends breakfast plate. Keith's father was directly across from Keith and his brother off to his left. Will yawned and patted his belly, now full of food. Wonder how long it will take the rest of them to finish? Will thought.

A shadow started to appear above Will. Looking up Will thought he could make out a bottle or glass or some sort of container was above him. Suddenly a red liquid started raining down on Will. It was thick and sticky and it when it landed on Will it pushed him into the top of Mount Scramble. Will landed face first into the eggs and stated to slip down the side of eggs he was on top of. Some of the red paste landed in Wills mouth. Ketchup?!? Will thought nervously. Will forgot that his friend liked to eat his eggs with ketchup but didn't notice any on his plate before. Must have forgotten when he was talking with his family. Moving in the ketchup was very difficult, but Will was able to turn around. "Keith!!!" Will yelled up in a panic. That panic turned into terror once he saw Keith resume eating the rest of his eggs. The Mount Scramble from before was more like a Hill Scramble now. "KEITH!!! STOP!! LOOK DOWN!!" Will yelled in-between gasps of ketchup running into his mouth. Will tried waving his arms as well, but it was difficult in the red paste that he was trapped in.
1331.title: Keith’s plate (Mount Scramble!)

135.content:
Oh no! You look around the now colossal laboratory: you have shrunk to 1/8 of an inch tall! You began walking--staggering, more accurately--around on the hardwood floor. There are dirt and dust specks laying haphazardly around on the floor, which are the size of pebbles and small rocks to you.

From a distance, you hear a distant 'Boom', 'Boom', 'Boom', which sounds like thunder. But then you notice that the thunder sounds are getting louder and that you are feeling the vibrations of whatever it was under your feet. The thundering gets louder and louder, the vibrations from each thunderclap vibrating more and more violently under your feet until you can hardly keep your balance! "Damn!" you exclaim, "What's going on!?!"

However, you aren't left to wonder long. The thunder was the sound of Keith's footsteps, walking toward the laboratory with two cans of soda in hand. Before long, Keith is standing in the lab, looking around for you. "Will! Will! What're you doing?" Keith's voice boomed, the bass in his voice reverberating against the floor beneath you. "Dude, don't screw around in here!" Keith's voice was getting louder. At such a size, Keith's voice is getting too loud for your ears to handle.

Keith takes a couple of booming steps closer to you. The toes of Keith's brown boots are now planted two inches in front of you. You look up at the boots totally flabbergasted: the toes of Keith's boots seem at least sixty feet high!! Your mind races: how can you get Keith's attention? Just then, Keith's right boot shifts slightly forward; but to you, it seems like it thrust toward you and stopped just short of you by...an eighth of an inch, ironically. All priorities have now changed. The question now is: how are you going to keep from getting squashed by a friend who, at your size, seems to tower 3,500 feet!!!
135.title: Attack of the 3,500 foot man!!

choices: Keith's parents are inside, shrunk to an eighth of an inch!

"You are Will, a sixteen-year old boy who has shrunk to 1/8 of an inch..." "Sure I'll do it!" she exclaims, passing you back to Carla and pulling off her top. Underneath she's wearing a sports bra, and you watch with dismay as she pulls it off, then puts her top back on. She takes you back, and without a moment of fanfare drops you straight down her shirt. Terrified by the drop, you grab desperately at the fabric - and end up latched onto a breast the size of your entire body. She can't be more than a B-cup at most, but at this size her breasts are enormous nonetheless; one of your hands is clutching onto a nipple bigger than your head, the other clutching helplessly at smooth skin.
"Oh, I can feel on my breast - eww, it feels so weird!" you hear Debbie exclaim, her chest rising and falling drastically with each breath, almost bucking you off. Screw this brat! Holding on with your knees, you take the massive nipple with both hands and twist with all your strength. "Ow!" you hear her exclaim, and she jerks suddenly beneath you - but you don't let go. Somehow you get a little leverage and manage to pull your head out of her belly button, and with a quick movement you throw off your shirt, slipping out of her grasp. You sprint down her belly, almost losing your footing as your trainers sink into quivering flab, and dive for the waistband of her skirt, wriggling beneath it.

A moment later however, you feel the panties slip - your weight is pulling them down! "Well great, now we'll have to move the drawers," you hear Debbie complain irritably beyond the dresser, and you realise that your freedom won't last long if you don't think of a plan.
141112.title: Captivity

choices: The next morning, you're awoken by the drawer being opened
You wake in the night to see Debbie asleep - time to run for it!
1411122.content:
You need a way to fight back. Urgently, you search the underside of the dresser for anything that could serve as a weapon - your hands eventually alighting on a toothpick. It could serve as a makeshift spear of sorts - it wasn't much, but it was definitely better than nothing. Still, it wouldn't do much more than irritate the girls, even if you got a really good shot in.
Then, you looked down at your hands. They're still stained with remnants of the green slime that the hundred-dollar bill that had started this whole mess had devolved into when you touched it. Mind racing, you smear as much as you can on the tip of your spear, staining the wood with green slime.

Now you're armed - but even as you examine your new weapon, you feel the drawers shift above you.
"Come on, lift it more, dumbass!" you hear Debbie reprimand her friend, and you see their feet on either side of the dresser, lifting it. You sneak to the side of the dresser and peak out from beneath, spotting Carla looming over you, focused on moving the dresser - and your cheeks flush a little as you see that she hasn't put her panties back on yet.
You bide your time, waiting - and then at the moment she seems most distracted you sprint forwards, leaping atop her immense sandalled foot. Before she can react, you the drive the spear with all your might into her little toe, feeling the point snap against bone. She shrieks with pain and kicks you aside, and you roll back under the dresser and to safety once again. From there you watch as Carla sits down heavily, clutching at her foot and wailing. You examine your spear - the tip contaminated with green slime is gone, splintered off inside the huge girl's body.

A moment later, you watch with pure glee as your wildest hopes come true - before your eyes, you watch as Carla begins to shrink as the green slime does its work. First she reduces down to the size of a dog, then a cat, then finally to your own size, and the tiny girl is left wailing in the middle of the carpet, sobbing as she clutches her toe and staring around at the now-immense world. Stunned and horrified in equal measure by your victory, you sprint to the hole you'd spotted earlier that leads into the drawer above you and pull yourself up, finding yourself in a drawer full of underwear - Debbie's. presumably.

Outside the chest of drawers you can hear Debbie swearing as she searches for her friend, and terrified of the potential repercussions you bury yourself amid the piles of clothes, laying low and covering your head in terror. Eventually you hear Debbie leave the room, storming furiously down the stairs, but still afraid you worm deeper into the pile of panties, covering your head.

Somehow, after what feels like hours, you find yourself drifting to sleep, and you let it happen - this is as safe as you can be for the near future, you'll need the rest - and the bed of panties is surprisingly comfortable. Wrapped in warm fabric, you let yourself fall into a deep and dreamless slumber.
1411122.title: Sweet Revenge

choices: Stay here - it's the sensible option
Strike out for home - it's dangerous, but you don't want to stay here
14111221.content:
Sudden blinding light and a sharp motion rip you from your slumber, and you realise with terror that Debbie has opened the drawer. You pull a pair of stripy panties over your head and peek out from beneath them to see the brattish girl staring down curiously into the drawer. For a moment you think she's seen you, but then she just grabs a pair of panties from beside you and chucks them onto her bed -- then she pushes the drawer closed, but quite all the way.
You jump to your feet and scramble over the pile of panties, running to the crack of light revealed by the slightly open drawer. Reaching it, you tentatively poke your head out the top and survey Debbie's room from the your low vantage point. She's moving around the room in a nightgown, seemingly assembling an outfit for school - has she forgotten about you? Maybe she thinks you've already escaped?

As you watch, she pulls off her gown, wincing as the fabric brushes over her chest. One of her nipples is red and swollen, and you feel proud that you managed at least a little lasting damage. She pulls on her outfit, then heads over to the hamster cage.
"Sup. How you doing?" you hear her speak down into it, face pushed close to the bars, "Nah, I think he must be long gone. Probably ran off while I was dealing with you. You really are a dumbass, y'know? Seriously, you let him get you in the toe? Idiot." There's another pause, then she continues, "Look, I got you some food, eat it. What? No, I don't give a damn if you're not hungry - you messed up and lost me my pet, so unless I find him again you're staying in there. And you'll eat what I give you, too!"

You duck back down as she turns away from the hamster cage - does she really have Carla locked up in there, or is this a trick? - but she doesn't come over to the drawers again. She just heads straight out of her room, and you hear her tread on the stairs as she leaves.

You collapse down on a pair of polka-dot panties and ponder your next move. With Debbie gone for the day, you could leave - but where would you go? You don't know where in the city you are, and at three inches tall trying to find your way home would be suicide. If anything, staying here is the safest option.
Your stomach grumbled, and you're suddenly aware that you're very hungry. You may have survived Debbie and Carla - for now, at least - but starvation may still get you.
However, it seems luck is on your side. As you wander aimlessly in the underwear drawer, you stumble across a hidden box of biscuits. Eagerly you tear them open and have yourself a feast - at your size, even one biscuit is enough food for several days. Now you're just thirsty, but again it seems Lady Luck has your back - as you investigate on ground level, you find a discarded can of coke with enough liquid left in it to satiate your thirst.

Perhaps you should hide out here for a few days? At least until you've figured out a plan for getting home? There's a bed, plus food and water - and though Debbie is a danger, she seems to think that you're long gone.
14111221.title: A Little Man, a Little Plan

choices: Debbie sniffs you out - she finds the recess!
141112211.content:
Over the next few days, you get to work. Using an axe made of your loyal toothpick and a tiny sliver of stone, clumsily fastened together with wire from an underwire bra, you shave off minute pieces of wood from the dresser, and with the aid of some chewing gum you found stuck to the leg of Debbie's desk, you fashion it into a makeshift segmented ladder. This you can use to reach parts of the room that are too high up for you to get to by climbing, and by using it you manage to reach several key locations.

Reaching the window gives you an unlimited supply of water in the form of condensation; the desk gives you access to the remnants of any food Debbie consumes whilst working there; the wardrobe a perfect hiding place in the form of a little recess at the back that's almost invisible to anyone over three inches tall. In short, everything you need to live here indefinitely. The one place you haven't been able to reach is the hamster cage - it's on top of a tall bookshelf, and your ladder is too short to make it up there. Every day though, you watch Debbie put food in through the bars to her friend trapped inside - and from her comments as she did so, it was obvious Carla is as much a prisoner in there as you had been. You can't help but feel a little sorry for the girl; she's a brat, but now she's at Debbie's mercy, and you know from experience that was not a pleasant place to be.
"Here you go, fatty," you hear Debbie say to her prisoner one morning, "I got you some chocolate cake. A little pig like you should enjoy that kind of thing. Come on, eat it up - or I'll feed you to the neighbour's dog."

With that, you resolve to rescue her. Carla isn't a nice person, but she doesn't deserve this!
Over the next week, you work on a ladder tall enough to reach the hamster cage. You have a few close calls almost getting caught out in the open by Debbie, but in the end you manage to assemble a ladder that should reach the cage. You wait for Debbie to head off for school, then you begin the lengthy task of assembling the ladder against the table upon which the cage is perched. It takes hours, and every moment you're anxious Debbie will return, but finally it's done - you scale your ladder and climb onto the top of the table, then jog over to the hamster cage and rattle the bars.
"Hey, yo - Carla, are you in there?" you call. There's no reply - until finally, a plaintive little voice rings out.
"I-is... is that you? The boy who escaped?" you hear her speak, though you can't see where from.
"Yeah, it's me. I'm here to rescue you," you announce, unbolting the cage door and pulling it open, "C'mon, Debbie will be back any minute!"

"I-I'm not sure I can... just leave me here..." you hear her plead, and you frown.
"What? No way! It took me ages to get all the way up here - no way am I leaving you now. Come on, what's wrong?"
Slowly, self-consciously, Carla walks out into the open from behind a piece of tubing and you gasp. She was- she was huge! Well, not huge - she was less than three inches tall - but she was fat! The pudgy girl you remembered had disappeared - now she was simply fat, nude and quivering in the middle of the cage.
"Jesus, what happened?" you ask, stunned. Carla bursts into tears.
"D-Debbie k-kept feeding m-me too much... she s-said that s-since it was my fault you escaped I should be her pet instead, and she s-said she'd feed me to a dog if I didn't eat!"
You nod - you'd heard most of that from your hiding spots, but you hadn't realised how bad the impact had been on Carla's body. Maybe now you were tiny, your metabolisms were accelerated as well?
"Well, I'm getting you out of here. Come on!"

Ignoring her protests, you help her climb up and out of the cage, struggling to lift her fleshy bulk. Now, the ladder - you went first, the idea being that you could catch Carla if she fell - not that that was very likely. Well, the falling was likely, the catching less so - she must weigh twice what you do.
The descent is long and arduous, and by the time you reach the bottom Carla is wheezing with exhaustion There's no time to lose though; you hear a door slam downstairs, and desperately you hurry Carla into a sprint towards your hiding place in the back of the cupboard.
"Come on! Debbie's back! Run!" you shout, dragging Carla along at top speed - which isn't very fast at all, unfortunately. You hear Debbie's tread on the stair as you reach the wardrobe, and it opens a millisecond after you heave Carla into it.

You're not safe yet though!
"What the-" you hear Debbie exclaim at the sight of the ladder leading up her table - then you hear her swear loudly at the realisation of Carla's absence. "Damn you, you little bastard!" she shrieks, "I'm gonna find you both, and when I do I'll tear your legs off with my bare hands!"
Carla begins to sob in terror, but you shove her towards the recess in the back corner of the wardrobe.
"Quick, in here!" you exclaim, as you hear the sounds of Debbie tearing her room apart behind you in her search. Carla goes to squeeze into the recess - but her imprisonment has left her too wide! Her hips wedge against the wood and stick her in place, and she cries and squeals as you hear Debbie approach the wardrobe.
With all your strength, you give her a mighty kick in the rear, and with an audible popping sound, she slips free! You leap into the recess after her, disappearing from sight just as Debbie opens the wardrobe door.

She won't find you here - you're safe.
141112211.title: A Rescue

1411122112.content:
Eventually, Debbie had grown tired of searching. Perhaps she thought you'd left as soon as you saved Carla. You hadn't, of course - this place was your home now, and in time your dreams of returning to your family faded away. After a week's hard effort, you managed to tear up the corner of a floorboard, and down there in the space between the floors you created a true home for Carla and you.

As it turns out, your theory about a faster metabolism was correct. As you sit in your little chair on your porch, you look out at the tiny civilisation that you have built, populated entirely by you and Carla's children; in less than two years she has delivered you nearly twenty kids, and though you two yourselves don't seem to age quickly yourselves, your offspring grew into adulthood with stunning speed. Now some of them are having children of their own, falling pregnant and delivering in less than a week, and you wonder if before long you'll have to start sending some of them out on colonisation missions to other houses.

Above your little homes, you sometimes hear Debbie stomping around in her bedroom, and you recall with a shudder the earliest days of your miniature life. Honestly, you were lucky - you may never see your mom and dad again, but as you look around at your children hard at work cutting down floorboards to make into a town hall, it occurs to you that it could have been far, far worse.

You hear someone call to you, and you twist around in your chair to look. It's Carla, and she's holding up a plate of scorched mouse meat, caught by one of your hunting parties last week and cooked on the tiny fire you managed to assemble. You smile at her, and call back that you'll be right there. As you head towards her, you gaze over your shoulder at the little family that you have built here - then forwards at your beautiful wife.

It may have seemed bad at first, but on reflection - perhaps the miniature life wasn't so bad after all.

You are placed into an old, somewhat beat-up steel hamster cage. Some of the metal is even a little rusty. The cage is then set over by the cages of the other tiny people. The kids are all brought in with their parents, because the animals kept in the back room are very expensive. Two days after you were shrunk the first of the tiny people was sold for $1000. It was the guy two cages down from yours. He was bought by a 12 year old boy who you could tell was from a very rich family.

The next one sold was the woman, who was bought by an 8 year old girl (one of the few girls that came in to look). She was sold for $600.

And finally just yesterday there was a dad with his 6 year old son who went home with the guy in the other cage. That kid looked like he was going to handle the poor shrunken man a bit rough, and as badly as you felt for him you were glad he didn't pick you. You noticed that the price for him had dropped drastically to only $200. You also noticed that they were not bringing in any other newly reduced people for sale, and now you are the last one here. All of the cages of the exotic animals in the room were being cleaned and updated by the teenage boy that captured you.

You yell up to him "Hey, if you'll make me big again I'll be happy to pay you the $1000 you'll lose for not selling me. In fact, I'll double it and make it $2000."

He laughs out loud, and makes his way over to your cage. You are looking straight up at his massive smiling face as he says "Forget it dude. There's no way to reverse it even if I wanted to. Besides, you'd talk. And we can't have that. Word has somehow gotten out that we are selling something illegal, and we're being inspected today. And when they get here, you won't be here."

He walks away, leaving you wondering exactly what he's going to do with you.

You can tell from the conversation that the man is thinking about and wanting to price something more exotic than the dogs & cats out front, but you can also tell he probably can't afford much. The kid shows him a couple of the snakes, one of the lizards, and some of the large rats. He shows some interest in one of the snakes, but every time the kid tells him the price (which is usually over $200) the man doesn't immediately say no, but it's obvious he doesn't want to spend that kind of money.

"Ok, tell me again how old your son will be" you hear the kid say to the customer.

"His birthday is Wednesday, and he'll be 8. We got his brother a really big aquarium with all the cool saltwater fish for his 9th birthday earlier this year. Now Luke wants a pet, but we would rather not have a dog or a cat in the house. So my wife and I figured something he could keep in a cage on his dresser would be the best. I'm just not sure we can spend that much money right now, though."

"Well, let me show you one more thing" the kid says. "We only have one of these left, and I'm not sure when we'll be getting any more." The kid continues, "Every kid in the world would love to have their own living, breathing action figure. How would your son feel about opening this for a birthday present?"

He is somewhat speechless, but he finally manages to ask "How much is he?"

"Well, I can't let him go for any less than $200. But I think for that price your son would much rather have him than the snake."

The man continues to stare at you, as you are standing only about 3 inches tall in a hamster cage, and finally says "I wish I could, but that's just a little out of my price range right now."

He turns to start walking back towards the door, and the kid says to him, "Well, what if we threw in a brand new cage, and a few other accessories I know your son would want. The cage itself is $35, so you'd be getting a bargain."

"It's somewhat tempting, but I'll have to think about it for a while" the man answers him back. "I have a few days, so I'll probably stop back in."

"I know I'll sell him before then, and like I said I don't know when we will be getting in any more. I'd hate to see your son miss out on such an awesome pet. What if we give him to you for half price, only $100?"

You are placed into an old, somewhat beat-up steel hamster cage. Some of the metal is even a little rusty. The cage is then set over by the cages of the other tiny people. There are two men and one woman. You notice that the other small animals kept in this room have newer and cleaner cages than you and the other little people have been put in. Maybe this is an indication of how low this teenage boy thinks you are.

And he is absolutely right. Over the next week they are constantly escorting in pre-teen girls to see the exotic animals in the back room, but once they enter the room they make a beeline for the cages with the shrunken people. The kids are all brought in with their parents, because the animals kept in the back room are very expensive. Two days after you were shrunk the first of the tiny people was sold for $1000. It was the guy two cages down from yours. He was bought by a 12 year old girl who you could tell was from a very rich family.

The next one sold was the woman, who was bought by an 8 year old boy (one of the few boys that came in to look). She was sold for $600.

And finally just yesterday there was a dad with his 6 year old daughter who went home with the guy in the other cage. That little girl looked like he was going to handle the poor shrunken man a bit rough, and as badly as you felt for him you were glad she didn't pick you. You noticed that the price for him had dropped drastically to only $200. You also noticed that they were not bringing in any other newly reduced people for sale, and now you are the last one here. All of the cages of the exotic animals in the room were being cleaned and updated by the teenage boy that captured you.

You yell up to him "Hey, if you'll make me big again I'll be happy to pay you the $1000 you'll lose for not selling me. In fact, I'll double it and make it $2000."

He laughs out loud, and makes his way over to your cage. You are looking straight up at his massive smiling face as he says "Forget it dude. There's no way to reverse it even if I wanted to. Besides, you'd talk. And we can't have that. Word has somehow gotten out that we are selling something illegal, and we're being inspected today. And when they get here, you won't be here."

He walks away, leaving you wondering exactly what he's going to do with you.

choices: Not a gift for who you think
1411221221.content:
He finishes cleaning up a little bit, then picks up your cage and moves it up to a high shelf, covers it with a cloth and hides it behind a box. Then he heads back out to the front of the store.

About 30 minutes later the door opens and the teenage boy walks in followed by a woman who looks like she's about 35 or so. You can tell from the conversation that the woman is thinking about and wanting to price something more exotic than the dogs & cats out front, but you can also tell she probably can't afford much. The kid shows her a couple of the snakes, one of the lizards, and some of the large rats. She shows some interest in one of the snakes, but every time the kid tells her the price (which is usually over $200) the woman doesn't immediately say no, but it's obvious she doesn't want to spend that kind of money.

"Ok, tell me again how old your daughter will be" you hear the kid say to the customer.

"Her birthday is Wednesday, and she'll be 8. We got his brother a really big aquarium with all the cool saltwater fish for his 9th birthday earlier this year. Now Lucy wants a pet, but we would rather not have a dog or a cat in the house. So my husband and I figured something she could keep in a cage on his dresser would be the best. I'm just not sure we can spend that much money right now, though."

"Well, let me show you one more thing" the kid says. "We only have one of these left, and I'm not sure when we'll be getting any more." It doesn't surprise you at all to feel the cage moving as he lifts it off the shelf to show you to this woman. He puts the cage down on one of the tables and lifts the cloth off. "As you can see this is something you won't find in every pet store." The customer's eyes widen as she stares in disbelief at what she's seeing. The kid continues, "Every kid in the world would love to have their own living, breathing action figure. How would your daughter feel about opening this for a birthday present?"

She is somewhat speechless, but she finally manages to ask "How much is he?"

"Well, I can't let him go for any less than $200. But I think for that price your daughter would much rather have him than the snake."

The woman continues to stare at you, as you are standing only about 3 inches tall in a hamster cage, and finally says "I wish I could, but that's just a little out of my price range right now."

She turns to start walking back towards the door, and the kid says to her, "Well, what if we threw in a brand new cage, and a few other accessories I know your daughter would want. The cage itself is $35, so you'd be getting a bargain."

"It's somewhat tempting, but I'll have to think about it for a while" the woman answers him back. "I have a few days, so I'll probably step back in."

"I know I'll sell him before then, and like I said I don't know when we will be getting in any more. I'd hate to see your daughter miss out on such an awesome pet. What if we give him to you for half price, only $100?"

The woman thinks about it momentarily, then says "That's just a lot of money to spend without consulting my husband. I'll really have to come back after talking to him."

"Look" the kid says, almost interrupting her, "what would it take for you to walk out of here with the coolest gift in the world for your daughter Lucy? Let's try to figure something out."

"I'll tell you the truth, I'd have a hard time affording the $35 for just the cage right now. I really don't think this is a doable thing."

The kid looks down at you for a moment, then looks at his watch, knowing that the inspectors could be there at any time. "Tell you what, I won't ever make this kind of deal again. You buy the cage, and I'll throw him in for free."

The woman looks at him like she can't believe what he's saying, then just smiles, sticks out his hand and says "DEAL." They shake hands, sealing your fate as the birthday gift for an 8 year old girl.

155222211.content:
You flinch as it looks like the giantess is about to step on you and crush you but as the mighty foot comes down with a loud boom, you open your eyes and then look up to see that you had finally caught a lucky break. You were in between the space that separates her heel from the rest of her shoe. The mighty huge flight attendant didn't even touch you. You breathe a sigh of relief as the titaness walks away. For once something went right. It looked like you were very lucky. "That was too close for comfort." You say. You then look up and see that you seemed to have gotten smaller. You felt around your body and then you gasp. You had shrunken again, this time to 1/4 of an inch tall. You let out a high pitched scream as you grab yourself by the sides of the head and breathe in and breathe out.

"Calm down, William," you say. "Don't panic. Just focus on survival. You then hear wheels and have to move out of the way as a stewardess is pushing a cart and you scream. You let out a sigh of relief having dodged the catering tray but then you see something just as big and dangerous coming forward and gasp. It was the stewardess's enormous foot. You try to run but you slip and fall and grab hold of the tip of the pump to avoid being squashed. This proves to be a big mistake as you are then thrown up into the air as the stewardess moves her foot forward and the movement sends you flying and screaming before you land on the serving tray and are pushed underneath the tin. The area is pitch dark and you look around and see absolutely nothing. Then you shiver because you had landed in a complementary meal. You try to live the tin and grunt as you struggle to free yourself, but at your shrunken size, the silver dome is too heavy and you fall back and scream as you slip into the meal.

You are too afraid to open your eyes and feel around. From the looks of it, you had slipped into a mess of meat and vegetables wrapped in pita bread. You smell the air and realize that to your horror, you are inside a gyro. You try to break free but you’re stuck inside and can’t move. You give a gulp and dread what comes next. You were about to be somebody’s tiny little greek delicacy. Soon, you hear a clanking sound and you realize that one of the passengers received the plate that you were in. “Oh no.” You say as you look in horror. The tin is lifted up and you see exactly who you had been delivered to.

The passenger was a tan-skinned Greek woman with long pink hair. She was very fat, weighing at least 300lbs. She was dressed like a businesswoman in a gray suit with black nylon stockings, purple sunglasses and a white silk tie. The tan-skinned giantess licks her lips as she picks up the gyro and you scream and struggle to get yourself out before you get devoured. You manage to inch closer and closer to the outside of the gyro but then you gasp as you see the giant woman’s large teeth getting closer and closer. “Stop!” you yell. “Don’t eat me!” The fat giantess gives a look of surprise before she adjusts her sunglasses and then looks into the gyro. You cross your fingers and hope A) She sees you and B) She’s friendly.

The great big Greek titaness looks into the gyro and is surprised at finding a 1/4 of an inch tall human inside her inflight meal. But what does she do with you now?
