1552222112.content:
As you’re stuck in the gyro hoping for the best, the Greek giantess plucks you out of the gyro before quickly devouring it. You almost faint at what almost became your fate. But then the woman closes her hand, covering you once more with darkness. You give a gulp as you wonder exactly what she has in store for you. Then again, she saw you and had the perfect opportunity to eat you and yet she chose not to. Maybe this fat lady meant you no harm. As you’re wondering what to do now, you hear the massive lady get up and start to walk her way towards the plane’s restroom, carrying you in her hand. From what little you could see, this woman was very big in height as well as weight and was a good head or so taller than the stewardesses. You hear a door opening and realize that the woman has taken you into the bathroom right as she opens her hand and takes you to the front of her huge face. She lowers her sunglasses and her moon-sized eye is right above you. You try to inch back but her long fingers decorated with pink polish stop you as the giantess smiles down at you.

“Oh my,” she says in a Greek accent. “A little man no bigger than 1/4 of an inch tall. I finally found one.” You give a look of confusion. She had been looking for somebody as small as you. You shiver and fall back in the giant fat lady’s palm. “Please don’t hurt me, ma’am. My name is William. I was on my way with my family to board a plane to Ohio when I found a strange canister that sprayed me and shrank me. I tried to get one of the stewardesses to help me but I fell off of her and now...” The giantess gives a look of surprise. “So that’s where my shrinking mist went,” says the obese titaness as she smacks herself in the forehead. “I can’t believe I left it at the airport. Darn. That stuff was expensive.” You give a look of sure surprise. “You mean you’re the own who owned that shrinking stuff!?” The Greek lady sighed and nodded her head. “That smoke is designed specifically to only affect men and shrink them to tiny size. I needed somebody as bite-sized small as you and was planning to bring the shrinking mist back to Greece to shrink the strongest, most athletic man I could find.” The giantess lets out a sigh as her fat body jiggles. “Oh well. You’ll do just well.”

You’re now more afraid than ever. This monstrous lady was the one who shrank you and she needed you for some unknown purpose. “Please, lady,” you say. “Unshrink me. I need to get back to my family.” The giantess shrugs her shoulders. “I’m sorry, William,” she says. “But that spray is irreversible. I couldn’t unshrink you if I wanted to.” You give a look of pure fear. You were stuck at the size of an insect. Then the giantess smirks at you. “But trust me. What I have planned for you is something that will make it worth it to be that small.” “But, lady...” “Oh,” says the big fat Greek lady. “I forgot to introduce myself. My name is Hippolyta. Get it memorized because you work for me now. You’ll see what I mean soon enough.” Before you can say anything else, Hippolyta unbuttons her shirt and stuffs you down her cleavage as you let out high pitched screams and then buttons herself up before she gives a smile. “If I were you, my little William,” she says. “I’d take a good rest. You’re going to need it.” With that, your ginormous captive walks back into the cabin humming to herself. As you sink into the woman’s big fleshy body, you wonder exactly what Hippolyta intends for you. You’re so tired from trying to pull yourself out that you promptly pass out.

- -

Hours pass and you wake up hearing the sound of Hippolyta’s massive feet on the ground. From the sounds around her, Hippolyta has arrived back in Greece but you didn’t know which city. You grunt and climb up this fat woman’s cleavage in an attempt to escape but Hippolyta feels you and pokes in her finger to push you back down into the cleavage. “Naughty, naughty, William,” scolds the colossus as if she were your mother. “Just be patient. I assure you that I have nothing malicious in store for you.” Hippolyta gives a giggle that worries you. That’s what the big lady says, but you’re not entirely sure. Suddenly, her footsteps stop and Hippolyta gives a giggle. “You can come out now, William.” You’re skeptical but then you grunt as Hippolyta picks you up by the shirt. “What the?!” You look around and see enormous women as big and heavy as Hippolyta and then you gasp because each one has a 1/4 of an inch high young man like you with them. The shrunken men were dressed in athletic gear and for some reason, none of them seemed afraid of the giantesses around them.

You’re speechless at what you see but then you hear stomping and see another giantesses walk up next to Hippolyta. This giantess was an obese blonde dressed as a biker and she had a shrunken fair-haired young man your age in a small cage hanging from her navel piercing. From the look of it, he was lifting tiny dumbbells from inside the cage. His blonde handler taps her big belly and then looks at you and then smirks at Hippolyta. “So you finally found one, Hippolyta. Looks very week. I eat grains of rice beefier than that bugman. Axel won’t even have to try half his best to beat that little wimp.” The blonde gives a giggle before Hippolyta gives a scoff. “Oh,” she says. “Don’t worry. I’m sure my William is full of surprises. Your Axel will be eating his dust.” You look down at the young man in the blonde’s navel cage and he just scoffs at you. “You must be new here,” he says. “You don’t even look like a challenge. The blonde then begins to walk away, carrying the tiny man. “Come along, Axel. We better prepare for the first event.”

As the blonde walks away, you look back up at Hippolyta. “What is going on?” you ask. “What’s with all the fat ladies with shrunken men?” Hippolyta gives a laugh. “That’s simple,” your handler says as she pets you like a pet. “I’ve just entered you into the Anthill Games.” You blink. “Anthill games?” Hippolyta smiles. “In this games, Amazons like me enter shrunken men like you to compete in a series of games similar to the Olympics, except scaled down significantly. You should be honored. I’m giving you fame and fortune in the world of Anthill Games.” You bite your lips. “Is this legal?” Hippolyta gives a giggle. “Silly,” she says. “Only the secret society of amazons around the world know these games even exist. No government on Earth has any knowledge that big women like me shrinking boys like you is even possible, so it can’t be against any law.” “But is this safe?” “Oh, don’t be a worrywart. You’ll be fine. You just have to focus on beating the other bugman athletes. Isn’t this wonderful? Stay with me, and your future is secure. I’ll bet this beats your old life.” You give a gulp.
1552222112.title: The Anthill Games

choices: Chariot Racing with Ants as the Horses
Climbing Their Amazons From Toe to Head
15522221121.content:
You could not be more afraid. You were shrunken to 1/4 of an inch high and were the property of a great big fat lady you didn’t know and now you were signed up as an athlete competing against men just as tiny as you were who were the pets of other giant women like Hippolyta. You had no idea what the Anthill Games even consisted of and that made you nervous. However, Hippolyta assured you that she had no malicious intent and the games were perfectly safe. But even then you were scared half to death.  

Now Hippolyta, your new mistress, had taken you into a room with two other amazons as big and fat as she was, when another amazon comes in. This amazon is a portly ginger-haired giantess wearing an unbuttoned orange jumpsuit and a purple shirt as she waddles her way towards Hippolyta and the other giant women. “Welcome ladies, to the annual Anthill Games, presented on the top Secret Society of Amazons channel. Here, us amazons bring permanently shrunken bugmen to compete in the smallest competitive games on the planet. I’m your host, Juliet and here I have three amazon handlers who along with their adorable but hopefully powerful bugmen are long time spectators and first time competitors. These big ladies and their little men will hopefully rock the Anthill Games like an earthquake. Now, let’s meet our new competitors.

The first of the amazons that Juliet approached was a giant raven haired Italian woman with large purple horn-rimmed glasses who was wearing a suit of Amazon battle armor that made her look like a super-sized Xena. “Our first newbie is Tara DiMaggio and her bugman/boyfriend, Atlas.” Tara smirked and held up one of her pumps to show that the platform under the sole was hollow, showcasing a shrunken young man who was dressed as a gladiator. “I can see you two are big fans of the Anthill games. Love the amazon armor, Tara.” Tara gave a smirk. “I’ve been training Atlas hard for this competition. He’s especially prepared for the climbing part of the competition should it come up.” “That’s right,” said Atlas. “I didn’t allow myself to be shrunk just to lose the big games.” Juliet nodded her head and tapped on the pump where Atlas was in. You couldn’t believe how well he was taken being shrunk. What is with these 1/4 inch high men. Were you the only one concerned about your current predicament?

Next, Juliet walked up to an heavyset southern young woman with white streaks in her blonde hair. She was wearing a Southern belle style dress and turned around to reveal she was keeping a nervous-looking shrunken young man in her bustle. Given how big she was, you wonder why she would even bother wearing a bustle. “Our next newcomers are Amber Wells and her bugman, Crater. Any comments.” The other shrunken man was dressed in a commando style outfit but he still looked nervous as Amber turned around and sat back into two chairs. “I’m sorry ‘bout that,” she said in a Southern drawl. “The little guy doesn’t do so well with crowds. But trust me, Crater is going to ace anything to do with speed. I’ve been preparing him for the speed competition by making it seem like I was going to step on him if he weren’t fast enough.” You give a gulp. That woman sounded cruel. You’re glad you weren’t found by someone like her. 

It was there Juliet waddled up towards Hippolyta as Hippolyta holds you up and you look nervously as the giantess host looms over you. “And finally,” says Juliet. “We have Hippolyta Smythe and her bugman, William. My, he looks somewhat young for a bugman, doesn’t he, Hippolyta. Where did you find him?” Hippolyta gives a smile as you fall back into her hand. “The truth is,” she said. “He was a lucky accident. I bought the shrinking mist used to create antmen from somebody I knew in America, but I forgot to take it with me. As it turns out, this little cutie found it and unwittingly shrunk himself. Then as if fate wanted it that way, he wound up on the same plane I was using to fly back to Greece and I found him in my gyro.”

“I see,” says Juliet. “And you, William? Do you consider yourself the luckiest bugman alive that Hippolyta chose to turn you from a potential snack to a potential champion of the Anthill Games.” You see Juliet’s teeth dangerously close to you, like an obese great white shark with lipstick she was smiling at you. “I didn’t even know anything about these games,” you say. “I didn’t want any part of them. And I certainly didn’t want to shrink.” Juliet gives a giggle and pets you on the head. “A modest bugman,” she says. “How adorable. You’re so cute I could literally just eat you.” Juliet playfully gnashes her teeth and frightens you before walking out to continue her broadcast.

“And now,” she says. “Since the Anthill Games start tomorrow, it’s tradition to tell all bugmen and their amazon handlers the first of these great games so they can prepare themselves for the first round. The first event will determine which of these three newbies will move on to compete with the elite. For tomorrow’s game our bugmen will be...”
15522221121.title: Meeting the Competition

155222211211.content:
Juliet slaps her large belly before she announces tomorrow's game. "The first game that will determine which of these three big ladies and their ant men advance to the Anthill Games, will be the Ant Chariots." You lift an eyebrow as Hippolyta holds you up. "Ant chariots?" you ask. "What does that mean." You hear a noblewoman's laugh and then you see that Southern Belle giantess Amber laughing as she waved her enormously fat hips and shook Crater's cage as Crater grunted. "What kind of gall dumb question is that, sweetie. It's a chariot race but with ants instead of horses." You gulp as Amber smiles down. "It don't matter, sugeh. Because my Crater is going to bury you alive." Tara gives a scoff. "Oh yeah?" she asks. "Don't bet the farm on it. I'm a descended of actual amazons. My Atlas is going to win big." With every movement, Tara's fat body shakes and Atlas is shaken up as well in his girlfriend's boot as he grunts. "Watch it, baby," he says. "Save it for the games."

You just look up at Hippolyta in panic. "I don't know the first thing about chariot racing! I've never even ridden a horse! How do you expect me to control ants?! Why use ants at all." Juliet gives a scoff. "Small fry," she says. "We tried, but the shrinking mist doesn't work on animals, only men. Well, that's it for today. Tomorrow, we'll meet our competitors on the field of honor. Let's wish our amazon giants and their ant men good luck in tomorrow's games."

Hippolyta stomps away carrying you and you're more nervous than ever. "The Ant Chariots are one of the most popular of the Anthill Games, Will," says Hippolyta with a smile. "You should be honored." ***“Where did you find him? How did this happen?” the first woman asked.

***“That’s the thing: I don’t know. He just came out to me on the plane. Needed someone to take care of him, I guess,” Julia responded.

“Can we hold him?” the second woman responded.

Julia could tell that she was drunk and thus might be a little impulsive, so how does she respond?
155222221111212111121.title: At the Club

choices: You try to attack it to scare it away.
You hide in between her shins.
1552222211112121113.content:
A few minutes later you hear a shuffle in front of you. A giant crab is scurrying right towards you. To a normal human, it would be the size of a fist, but it’s easily three times bigger than you. You realize it’s scoping you out for its next meal.

You climb her shin, which provides immediate protection but still being eye level with this monster crab, it’s only temporary. You desperately try to scream and poke her awake but to little avail. The crab simply crawls up to you on her shin and begins threatening you with its giant pincers.
1552222211112121113.title: Hungry crab

choices: You run into someone or something.
You suddenly get sloshed by the waves.
The crab somehow routes you somehow and is standing right in front of you.
15522222111121211131.content:
The only “weapon” you have against it is the string tied to your ankle, which you try to loop around the nearest pincer to clamp it shut. Instead, it pierces the string causing it to cut in half.

You realize you are now free. You hop her other shin and bolt backwards, away from the crab and sleeping Julia. You run as fast as you can. Given its low intelligence, the crab doesn’t figure out where you went, keeps scurrying around her feet, and eventually walks away. You don’t care, though. You are free! Your immediate goal is to get as far away from this crazy situation as you can. The sand is hot against your feet, helping to encourage this mad-dash to not burn yourself.

High on adrenaline, you run having no idea where you are running.
15522222111121211131.title: Fight Back

choices: Some kind of wall, building, or stand
155222221111212111311.content:
You run a mad rush, just trying to get away from this giant crab, not seeing where you are going. You ram head first into some large surface and back down onto the sand.

Reality sets in, the crab seems long gone, but you need to watch where you are going. You look up and in front of you is…
155222221111212111311.title: In Front of You

choices: She shifts positions in her sleep, her butt landing on top of you.
Nothing happens: you have time to formulate a plan.
1552222211112121113111.content:
In front of you is a large sleeping woman, sunbathing on her side in a bikini. Her butt faces you, what you run into. Thankfully you ran into something soft, as you simply bounced backwards unharmed.

You begin to back up to take in the new situation and form an action plan.
1552222211112121113111.title: Into the Sunbather

choices: You manage to get out from underneath.
You’re trapped until she wakes up.
15522222111121211131111.content:
Unfortunately for you, her body rotates, moving onto her back. Her butt comes crashing down on top of you, sealing you underneath.

She sighs softly, unaware of her tiny prisoner in her sleep.
15522222111121211131111.title: She shifts positions

choices: Another wave come crashing on top of you
That you’re drifting off to sea
Someone nearby walking through the water in their bare feet
155222221111212111312.content:
You run a mad rush, just trying to get away from this giant crab. Suddenly water falls on top you. You had ended up running towards the water’s edge, and a wave comes crashing down on top of you.

You fight your way to the surface to see…
155222221111212111312.title: Underwater

choices: She leaves you there to run some errands.
15522222111121212.content:
Dialogue starred with three stars like this - *** - means that it is spoken in Portugese and thus that you, the narrator, doesn't understand it.

She rides for about 30 or 40 minutes before getting out. You hear her knock on the door and be greeted by a rush of hellos in a foreign language. You feel her hug about against another woman, which causes her breasts to compress against you.

Julia sits down somewhere inside, and they talk for a long few minutes in Portuguese. You can tell the woman is bit older by her voice.

Eventually, you feel a tug at your arms, as Julia brings you out. She sets your dangling body onto the table. *** “This is my boyfriend whom I wanted you to meet.”

You are standing on the table of a giant dining room. Julia is sitting behind you, and the woman in front of you is looks in her mid-fifties. She has similar eyes and a similar shaped face as Julia, and you realize that she must be her mother. She looks pretty slim for her age, and her make-up helps give her a younger look, well if you weren’t so small and able to notice the details of her face at least. She was wearing a purple t-shirt with a light black sweater overtop.

Her mother responds slightly surprised, and they begin talking about you in Portuguese. You walk over to some cover, but her mom scoops you up underneath your legs and brings you to her face for a closer look. Her eyes move up and down your body. She tries to talk with you, but you have no clue what she says. She pokes you gently in the chest and then raises each of your arms, inspecting you. She then proceeds to rub and prod your butt and genitals, before Julia protests. Her mother looks at Julia nonchalantly but puts you back down.

*** “Well I certainly wasn’t expecting someone so small. You tell me he’s your new boyfriend, but he seems more like a pet? Plus, he doesn’t speak any Portuguese.”

*** “He’s cute, and I like him better than the bigger boys,” Julia replies.

*** “I get that most of the men father and I have been trying to set you up with have been frustrating, but he’s not a real man. Maybe you need a break from those local boys, but he’s not big enough to be a boyfriend. He can’t meet your needs in that way. Keep him as long as need be, but eventually you’ll need a normal-sized boy.”

Julia rolls her eyes and scoops you back up.

*** “If you ever need to help training him, need someone to babysit him, or get sick of him, please let me know.”
15522222111121212.title: Visiting the Parents

choices: Julia’s mom serves lunch for the three of you.
Julia comes in and wants to do something.
Julia’s mom grabs you during a break from cooking and has some plans for you.
155222221111212121.content:
Dialogue starred with three stars like this - *** - means that it is spoken in Portugese and thus that you, the narrator, doesn't understand it.

*** “Let me make us some lunch, and I’ll be back in a little bit,” her mom states.

Julia also gets up and heads over to the bathroom.

You are left on the table and take stock of the house. It’s a large, well-adorned house, which as you look out the window realize sits on a cliff overlooking the city. You conclude that her parents must be wealthy.

In walks, a giant, slightly older man, easily in his mid-sixties. He sees you on the table and gives a large snarl. He shouts something at you in Portuguese and getting no response repeats it.

“I don’t speak Portuguese,” you stammer.

“Oh so you speak English,” he answers. “That’s fine. We are the Mendonca family. Have you heard of us?”

“No,” you reply back. “Should I?”

“Let’s just say, we have a long reputation. You clearly no nothing about the Brazilian mafia, but if you do, you’d know that I head the largest operation in this side of Western Hemisphere.”

That would explain their wealth, you think to yourself.

“Now, I am a nice person, and you seem like a nice person, or at least my daughter thinks so. But, if you hurt or even displease her slightly, let’s just say that I have chopped bigger humans up and fed them to the fish. Do I make myself clear?”

“Yes, sir,” you gulp.

“Good.” And with that, he walked over to his wife in the kitchen, gave her a pelican on the butt, and told her, *** “I need to do someone planning this afternoon and will take my lunch in my den with my boys.” He grabbed a bottle of scotch, turned to you with I’m-watching-you glare and walked away.

Your situation just went from bad to worse. Not only are you trapped in a foreign country by a young woman who doesn’t speak the same language, but it turns out that pissing her off could set up the Brazilian mob against you. You sit down and take it in.

In a few minutes….
155222221111212121.title: Lunch

choices: You pretend to be happy to keep her happy.
You can’t pretend and still look dejected.
She moves on and has some activities for the two of you.
1552222211112121212.content:
Dialogue starred with three stars like this - *** - means that it is spoken in Portugese and thus that you, the narrator, doesn't understand it.

You just sit there in the fetal position too shocked to move, processing what his death threat. After a few minutes, Julia comes into the room and walks over to you on the table.

***“Hey there, hopefully you had a nice conversation with my parents,” she smiles, obviously having no clue what your father says.

She whisks you up in her palm. Seeing that you are pretty forlorn, she brings you to her face, trying to smile brightly to get you to look happy.”

***“Hey, what’s wrong?” she gleans, trying to poke you jokingly to loosen you up. At first you don’t respond. She then strokes your back gently and plants a kiss across your entire body, seeing if that helped you feel better.

She has a look of disappointment when she sees that that didn’t really work to lift your spirits. Deep down, you are despondent, but you know you can’t communicate why and that disappointing her might be disastrous for you. How do you respond?
1552222211112121212.title: Julia Comes Back.

choices: She’s buying a dollhouse as your new home.
She’s shopping for tiny clothes for you.
155222221111212122.content:
Note: Dialogue starred with three stars like this - *** - means that it is spoken in Portugese and thus that you, the narrator, doesn't understand it.

*** “I have to go run some errands,” Julia announces. “I just figured I’d come over and introduce him to you.”

*** “Thank you,” her mom replies, and then turning to you, “Nice meeting you little guy.” She coddles to you like a little child. She instinctively reaches her hand towards you for a handshake. You wince as her hand comes towards you, but she transitions to her index finger simply refulling your hair. You try to push her finger away, but it just leads to you clasping it like a make-shift handshake.

With that, Julia closes her fist and shrouds you in darkness. Soon she drops you into the cupholder of her car.

*** “Family. Sometimes you love them; sometimes you hate them,” she pontificates to you, as if you can understand.

She then drives to a nearby store. What errand does she need to run?
155222221111212122.title: To the Mall

choices: She goes straight to bed after a long day of travel.
15522222112.content:
With a devilish smirk, she lowers you down to her waistline. You’re not sure what exactly is happening as she forces your body inside of her thigh-high stocking. The presses you down along her smooth leg with her hand. She slowly inches you as you try unsuccessfully to press back. The friction against the stocking is producing slight brush burns against your body. Once she gets to her shins, the pressure on the stockings loosen, and you simply fall to her ankle. Hitting hard against her heels. She takes her shoe off and continues sliding you until you are snug underneath her toes. She then puts her shoe back on. Her sinister face is the last image you see before total darkness. You can barely breathe from the pressure, which is the only thing preventing you from choking on the smell.

As she walks, you feel mini-earthquakes and hear a roaring thunder. The only noise that can be heard her footsteps is the PA system:
“Welcome to Rio from New York. Thank you for choosing our airlines. We hope you have a nice…” It keeps going. You become too busy to listen. You try to struggle, but this only seems to tighten her hold on you with her toes.

You can hear her go through security, go through the airport, get into a cab, and arrive at her apartment. You start to panic as you take in the situation: you are in a foreign country kidnapped by someone you can’t communicate with.

Eventually you feel her take off her shoe and plop her foot against a soft cushion-like substance. She then takes off her stockings. She wiggles her toes, pressing up against your helpless body. By the time she gets to the very end of her foot where you are, her stocking is a thick and tightly pressed against her toes. You get caught in the roughage and start to go out with it. At the same time, however, you are stuck to her toes from her sweat. Her toes violently tug at you, releasing you from the stocking, but you find yourself still glued against her toes. She giggles a little as she flaps her toes until you fall free.

Collapsed and tired, at first you don’t get up. You hear the thunderous noise of her moving above you, and eventually you get up to see what she’s doing. The cushion-like surface is her bed, which you are on. She is in front of you, sitting cross-legged with a wide smirk across her face. She really is pretty, too bad she seems a little crazy. She has long flowy black hair, smooth slightly tanned skin, a pretty green eyes, and a short cute noise. She’s wearing a red shirt and mini-skirt, which go down to her mid-thighs where her stockings had taken over before. She says something to you softly in Portuguese.
15522222112.title: In Her Stockings

choices: She has another game in mind.
155222221121.content:
“Why am I here? What do you want to do with me?” you scream.

Almost as if it’s on cue, she stretches her feet around. In a feat of flexibility, she turns the palm of her right foot partially upside down, and with her hands indicates that you should climb on. Seeing not much of a choice, you comply. You walk over to the foot, the smell overpowering you now. You grab the sole of her foot with one hand and push yourself up. It’s surprising how easy it is to climb at your size.

She then mimes that you should rub. You look down at the ground below you. Her sole is smooth and well-pedicured but salty from a day of sweaty traveling. Her sole is slightly slanted towards her toes as she can’t provide a perfectly level surface for you. You begin to rub with your hand as she emits a soft groan in pleasure. You quickly loose your balance, though, and fall on all fours. As you try to regain yourself, you hear snickers from above. You begin rubbing stronger to demonstrate your competence, but this seems to only tickle her. Her foot starts flexing in response. This produces an earthquake for you, causing you to fall backwards into her toes.

By now, she is roaring laughter as you land in between her big toe and her second toe. You begin to get up, using these two toes as footholds. Before you can get onto her sole, though, she separates these two toes so that you fall in between. She then quickly closes them back up trapping you between her toes. You start pounding against her sole with your hands as you look up. She faked an innocent face, with which she could barely conceal a small smirk.

She extended her leg and brought her foot vertically against the bed. Now, you were trapped as the ground became vertical looking what appeared to be a couple stories down her foot at the bed. You try to wiggle free, and in response, she wiggles her toes shaking you up and down violently. Eventually, this causes you to slide out, however, and you fall the distance of her foot onto the soft bed. The bed broke your fall and felt somewhat cushioned, but you are still winded from the impact. Soon her fingers scoop you up and lift you to her face.
155222221121.title: Fun Time

1552222211211.content: Bedtime, where else can I get you?
1552222211211.title: Now it's bed time.

choices: She’s a graduate student, headed to class.
It’s a day off, and she heads out. (Reader’s choice)
155222221122.content:
She walks over to her wardrobe and drops you into a drawer. She waves and smiles as she closes it, whispering something. It’s dark, but you can tell from the fabric that you are in her sock drawer. You hear her move around in the room outside, and eventually the one light source from the edge of the room switches off as you assume she is going to bed. It’s now pitch black for you, and eventually exhaustion hits.

Next thing you know, you are awoken to the sound of movement. After a few minutes, she opens the drawer up and takes you out. She whispers to you softly in Portuguese. The sudden light blinds your eyes, and she places into her v-neck blouse before you can get a good look around the world. She then proceeds to leave her apartment.

Where is she going?
155222221122.title: Drawered for the Night

1552222211221.content:
She leaves her apartment, walks along a sidewalk, and eventually onto a subway line. Even though her walking still knocked you around, it was nothing compared to the subway. She stood in a crowded space, where each movement seemed to completely overtake you.

Eventually, however, she gets off and walks to her work. She takes you out and places you on a large table, where she works, and gets ready for her job. She works at a…
1552222211221.title: Off to Work

choices: She has your captress incorporate you into the photoshoot.
During the photo shoot, she places you on the camera to keep her focused.
She brings you to her supervisor for a money-making idea.
15522222112211.content:
The table that she is standing on is a changing room for a photoshoot. You realize that she is a model preparing for a new shoot. So you weren’t just making up the fact that she was beautiful. She changes into a significantly more revealing red one-piece mini-shirk. It looks like the sort of thing someone would wear clubbing. She winks at you as you stare at her and pokes you “gently” in the stomach, causing you to fall over and her to giggle.

Her photographer comes over as she applies make-up. She gives your captress a few suggestions in Portugese. You walk around and examine the various items on the table to see, particularly the cord of a hair dryer which gives you an idea for an escape attempt once everyone’s busy. She listens to the photographer but is soon distracted by you as you wander around. The photographer, slightly annoyed, looks down to see what’s distracting her and gasps at the sight of you. Your captress narrates in Portuguese, presumably explaining how she found you.

The photographer has an idea and grabs you.
15522222112211.title: Preparing for the Photo Shoot

info.brief_description: Ever had that little problem where you begin to shrink radomly? No? Now you can!
info.description: Your name is Will, a 16 year old, and you have a little problem, you have shrunk! I'm going to start the story with different venues (5), so you get to pick when and where you shrunk, please add as much as possible!
